T03D3817:210b-6: mngon par rtogs pa'i dus na bdag go snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba dang /

T03D3817:210b-9: sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su btsal ba ste /
T03D3817:210b-10: gnas rnam pa bco brgyad po de dag ni byang
T03D3817:210b-11: chub sems dpa' gang la gnas par bya ba dang
T03D3817:210b-13: sems rab tu gzung bar bya ba'o //
T03D3817:210b-14: gnas de dag gis sa gsum bsdus te /

T03D3817:210b-16: mngon par rtogs pa'i gnas gcig pus ni lhag pa'i bsam ba dag pa'i sa'o //
T03D3817:210b-17: sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su btsal bas ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o //
T03D3817:210b-18: sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir sems bskyed nas /
T03D3817:210b-19: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la rab tu brtson
T03D3817:210b-20: pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku dang
T03D3817:210b-21: / chos kyi sku 'thob par 'dun pa bskyed do //
T03D3817:210b-22: de nas mngon pa'i nga rgyal la sogs pa dang /
T03D3817:210b-23: tha ma bdag go snyam du rnam par rtog pa
T03D3817:210b-24: la thug pa'i bar mngon par rtogs pa'i bgegs rnams
T03D3817:210b-25: dang sems bral bar byed do //
T03D3817:210b-26: de nas mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gdams ngag yongs su 'tshal lo //
T03D3817:210b-27: de nas mngon par rtogs par byed do //
T03D3817:210b-28: de nas gong du sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su tshol te /
T03D3817:210b-29: de'i phyir de dag gi go rims ni de lta'o //
T03D3817:210b-30: de la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dbang du
T03D3817:210b-31: byas nas sems can ji tsam zhes bya ba gsungs
T03D3817:210b-32: so // ji tsam zhes bya ba ni tshad do //
T03D3817:210b-33: ci de dag la tshad yod dam snyam pa la
T03D3817:210b-34: sems can du bsdu bar zhes bya ba gsungs so
T03D3817:210b-35: // sems can gyi khams tshad med mod kyi /
T03D3817:210b-36: 'on kyang sems can zhes bya ba ni gang de'i
T03D3817:210b-37: ngo bo snyam pa las log pa'i sgra'i don las
T03D3817:210b-38: brtags pa'i ngo bo skal ba 'dra ba zhes grags
T03D3817:210b-39: pa gang yin pa de ni sems can du bsdu'o
T03D3817:210b-41: rnam par brtags pa'i don gcig tu bsdus nas de'i
T03D3817:210b-42: ngo bor sgro btags pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i
T03D3817:210b-43: phung po'i bye brag gis bsdus pa dag ste /
T03D3817:210b-44: de'i phyir de dag tshe dang ldan pa 'dra bar snang ngo //
T03D3817:210b-46: bye brag tu bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3817:210b-47: sgo nga las skyes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3817:211a-0: @211a * // bye brag gi mtshan nyid de yang rab tu dbye ba gsum gyis gsungs te /
T03D3817:211a-1: skye gnas kyi dbye ba las ni sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi'o //
T03D3817:211a-2: gnas kyi dbye ba las ni gzugs can dang gzugs
T03D3817:211a-3: can ma yin pa gnas tha dad pa'i phyir te
T03D3817:211a-4: / gzugs can ni 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa rnams so //
T03D3817:211a-5: gzugs can ma yin pa ni gzugs med pa rnams so //
T03D3817:211a-6: mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i dbye ba las ni /
T03D3817:211a-7: 'du shes can zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3817:211a-8: 'bras bu che ba'i phyogs gcig dang /
T03D3817:211a-9: srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa'i sems can rnams ma gtogs par thams cad ni 'du shes can no //
T03D3817:211a-10: 'bras bu che ba'i phyogs gcig 'du shes med pa'o //
T03D3817:211a-11: 'di yang mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i dbye bar byas pa nyid de /
T03D3817:211a-12: de med pas rab tu phye bas des mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:211a-13: srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa rnams ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min no //
T03D3817:211a-14: rab tu dbye ba 'di ni blo zhan pa rnams
T03D3817:211a-15: la phan gdags pa'i phyir byas kyi gzhan dag 'phya
T03D3817:211a-16: ba spang ba'i phyir rab tu ma spros so //
T03D3817:211a-17: chos thams cad sems can med do zhes bya ba dang /
T03D3817:211a-18: bshad pa 'di mi 'gal bar bstan par sems can
T03D3817:211a-19: gyi khams kun rdzob kyi bden par sems can gyi
T03D3817:211a-21: ji tsam zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3817:211a-22: gdags pas zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'i bye brag gi bdag nyid du shes pa ste /
T03D3817:211a-23: mu stegs can gyis yongs su shes par brtags pa
T03D3817:211a-24: ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
T03D3817:211a-25: // 'dis ni skur ba'i mtha' spangs pa yin te /
T03D3817:211a-26: btags par yod na skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:211a-27: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings gang
T03D3817:211a-28: la zag pa dang bcas pa'i phung po lhag ma
T03D3817:211a-29: med pa de la de skad ces bya'i nyan thos
T03D3817:211a-30: kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ni 'dir
T03D3817:211a-31: mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ma yin te /
T03D3817:211a-32: de ni dman pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:211a-33: 'bras bu gya nom pa yod bzhin du snying brtse
T03D3817:211a-34: bdag nyid can rnams 'bras bu dman pa don du
T03D3817:211a-35: gnyer ba ni rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin
T03D3817:211a-36: no // gal te 'bras bu gya nom pa yod
T03D3817:211a-37: kyang thob par byed mi nus pas de ltar don
T03D3817:211a-39: khyod kyi lugs ltar na rigs gsum dang rigs med
T03D3817:211a-40: pa yang yod pas 'bras bu dman pa yang thams
T03D3817:211a-41: cad kyis thob par byed mi nus pa nyid do
T03D3817:211b-0: // 'on te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs @211b gnyis 'di 'dra ste /
T03D3817:211b-1: gang gi dbang gis ni thugs rje chen po'i shugs
T03D3817:211b-2: kyis non pa dag ni 'di ci nus sam snyam
T03D3817:211b-3: pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3817:211b-4: gzhan gyi don mdzad pa gzhan dag kyang bzhugs bzhin
T03D3817:211b-5: du 'dir bdag gis don med pa'i smon lam btab
T03D3817:211b-6: pas ci zhig bya snyam pa de lta bu'i rnam
T03D3817:211b-7: par spyod pa rnams spangs te /
T03D3817:211b-8: gzhan la ltos pa rgyang bsrings shing /
T03D3817:211b-9: snying brtse ba chen pos zin pa rnams 'gro ba
T03D3817:211b-10: sdug bsngal gyi me 'bar bas nyen par mthong nas
T03D3817:211b-11: 'di snyam du bdag kho nas bskyab po zhes smon
T03D3817:211b-13: dka' 'am mi dka' snyam pa yi //
T03D3817:211b-14: rnam par rtog pa rnam spangs nas //
T03D3817:211b-16: khyod bdag nyid kyis zhal gyis bzhes //
T03D3817:211b-17: zhes bshad pa lta bu'o zhe na /
T03D3817:211b-18: gal te de lta na yang bu sdug pa rgyal
T03D3817:211b-19: por smon pa ltar 'thob par bya mi nus pa'i
T03D3817:211b-20: gya nom pa nyid la ci'i phyir smon lam mi
T03D3817:211b-21: gdab / gang gi phyir na dman pa kho na don du gnyer bar byed /
T03D3817:211b-22: de lta bas na mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las
T03D3817:211b-23: 'das pa nyid 'dir phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i
T03D3817:211b-24: mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rigs te /
T03D3817:211b-25: de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:211b-26: ci'i phyir mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes de skad ma gsungs she na /
T03D3817:211b-27: bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa bsal ba'i phyir ro ;
T03D3817:211b-28: / de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sa 'og ma'i
T03D3817:211b-29: nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das
T03D3817:211b-30: pa'i rnam grangs su gsungs so //
T03D3817:211b-31: ci'i phyir phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya
T03D3817:211b-32: ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zhes ma gsungs she
T03D3817:211b-33: na / de ni sdug bsngal gyi phung po'i lhag ma ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:211b-34: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can thams cad
T03D3817:211b-35: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bsam pa ni
T03D3817:211b-36: rgyu gsum gyis blta bar bya ste /
T03D3817:211b-37: mi khom par skyes pa rnams la dus gzhan du sdod pa dang /
T03D3817:211b-38: mi khom pa'i gnas skabs ni nye bar mtshon pa'i
T03D3817:211b-39: phyir smon par zad kyi der zad pa ni ma
T03D3817:211b-40: yin te / de na gnas pa la yongs su
T03D3817:211b-41: mya ngan las 'da' ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro
T03D3817:211b-42: yin te / // yongs su ma smin pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
T03D3817:211b-43: yongs su smin pa rnams rnam par grol bar bya ba ste /
T03D3817:211b-44: des na don gnyer mi nus pa ma yin no //
T03D3817:212a-0: sems can ma lus pa yongs su mya ngan @212a * //
T03D3817:212a-1: las 'da' ba'i bsam pa 'dis ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rgya che ba bstan to //
T03D3817:212a-2: 'dir ji ltar 'dun pa smon lam gnyis kyis gnas par bya ba de yang bstan to //
T03D3817:212a-3: da ni ji ltar rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug
T03D3817:212a-4: pas ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba de bstan pa'i
T03D3817:212a-5: phyir / de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3817:212a-6: de ltar kun rdzob tu sems can thams cad yongs
T03D3817:212a-7: su mya ngan las 'das kyang byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3817:212a-8: ji ltar don dam par sems can gang yang dmigs
T03D3817:212a-10: de med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya /
T03D3817:212a-11: de ltar rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pas so sor brtag par bya'o //
T03D3817:212a-12: langs nas 'di snyam du don dam par bdag gis
T03D3817:212a-13: sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das
T03D3817:212a-14: par gyur pa med do snyam du sems bskyed pa
T03D3817:212a-15: gang yin pa 'dis ni zab pa bstan la /
T03D3817:212a-16: don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyang bstan to //
T03D3817:212a-17: snga mas ni kun rdzob bo //
T03D3817:212a-18: da ni g-yeng ba tshar gcod pas 'dir ji ltar
T03D3817:212a-19: sems rab tu gzung bar bya ba de bstan pa'i
T03D3817:212a-20: phyir / de ci'i slad du zhes bya ba smos so //
T03D3817:212a-21: gal te zhes bya ba ni ji ste zhes bya ba'i don dang sbyar ro //
T03D3817:212a-22: 'o na su gang zag la sogs par 'du shes
T03D3817:212a-23: 'jug pa de byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'am
T03D3817:212a-24: ci na / gang gi phyir sems can smos pa de kho na mdzad snyam du sems shing /
T03D3817:212a-25: yang ci'i slad du zhes zhus pa dang /
T03D3817:212a-26: cig shos kyis kyang mi bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T03D3817:212a-28: blo gros ngan pa dag gi yang de ni phung por las gzhan pa nang na bya ba dang /
T03D3817:212a-29: longs spyod bzhi po byed pa'i skyes bu zhig yod
T03D3817:212a-30: par yongs su brtags nas sems can dang srog la
T03D3817:212a-31: sogs pa'i sgrar tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /
T03D3817:212a-32: gang dag yang gang zag brjod du mi rung bar
T03D3817:212a-33: 'dod pa de dag gi yang de ni phung por
T03D3817:212a-34: gtogs pa'i chos dang mtshan nyid mi 'dra bar khas
T03D3817:212a-35: blangs pa'i phyir shugs kyis don gzhan pa kho nar
T03D3817:212a-37: thams cad kyang brjod du mi rung bar thal bar
T03D3817:212a-38: 'gyur ba'i phyir dngos po ni nam yang brjod du
T03D3817:212a-39: mi rung ba mi srid do //
T03D3817:212a-40: de ni sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3817:212a-41: gnod pa can yang yod pa'i phyir der lta ba'i
T03D3817:212a-42: byang chub sems dpa' ni phyin ci log la mngon
T03D3817:212a-43: par zhen pas phyin ci log kho nar 'gyur ro
T03D3817:212a-44: // gang phyin ci log tu gyur pa de don
T03D3817:212b-0: @212b dam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar 'gyur
T03D3817:212b-1: // / gzhan na re bdag sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma yod pa kho na yin nam /
T03D3817:212b-7: ngo shes pa la sogs pa ni gzhi gcig pa grags pa dag yin na /
T03D3817:212b-8: bdag med par smra ba khyed kyi lugs ltar na
T03D3817:212b-9: de dag gi gzhir 'grub par 'gyur ba gang yin
T03D3817:212b-10: pa gcig pu ni 'ga' yang med na gzhir 'gyur
T03D3817:212b-12: rnam par shes pa'i skad cig ma rnams kyi skad cig so so ni tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:212b-13: lha sbyin bcings la phyis mchod sbyin grol bar rnam par gzhag pa ni med do //
T03D3817:212b-14: gzhan gyis byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu gzhan gyis myong ba yang med do //
T03D3817:212b-15: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba dang /
T03D3817:212b-16: byas pa chud za zhing ma byas pa dang phrad par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
T03D3817:212b-17: 'di ltar byed pa por brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'i skad cig ma gang yin pa de dang /
T03D3817:212b-18: 'bras bu 'brel ba med pa'i phyir byas pa chud za ba'i skyon dang /
T03D3817:212b-19: byed pa po ma yin pa de kho na dang 'bras bu 'brel pa'i phyir ma byas pa dang /
T03D3817:212b-20: phrad pa'i skyon du yang 'gyur ro //
T03D3817:212b-21: dran pa la sogs pa yang 'jig rten na gnas tha dad par ma grags te /
T03D3817:212b-23: gnas gcig pa kho na ste /
T03D3817:212b-24: lha sbyin gyi sems kyis myong ba ni mchod sbyin
T03D3817:212b-25: gyi sems kyis dran pa 'am ngo shes pa med
T03D3817:212b-26: kyi / gang gis myong ba de nyid kyis dran zhing ngo shes so zhes grags so //
T03D3817:212b-27: de bas na skyes bu gcig pu gnas skabs thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba zhig yod do //
T03D3817:212b-28: sbyor ba ni bcings pa dang thar pa gang dag
T03D3817:212b-29: yin pa de dag ni gzhi gcig pa yin te
T03D3817:212b-30: / dper na lha sbyin lcags sgrog gis bcings pa dang thar pa bzhin la /
T03D3817:212b-31: rtsod pa'i gzhir gyur pa bcings pa dang thar pa gnyis kyang bcings pa dang /
T03D3817:212b-32: thar pa yin pas zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //
T03D3817:212b-33: de bzhin du byed pa po la gzhi gcig pa
T03D3817:212b-34: nyid du bsgrub pa la yang sbyor ba rtag par
T03D3817:212b-36: de la gal te 'dir skyes bu dang rang dbang
T03D3817:212b-37: can don dam pa rtag pa gcig pu zhig sgrub
T03D3817:212b-38: na ni de'i tshe de lta bu'i skyes bu dang
T03D3817:212b-39: gtan tshigs lhan cig 'brel par gang du yang ma
T03D3817:212b-40: grub pas ma nges pa yin no //
T03D3817:213a-0: 'du byed thams cad skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir lha sbyin la sogs pa @213a * //
T03D3817:213a-1: rtag pa gcig pu'i ngo bor ma grub pas dpe
T03D3817:213a-2: yang bsgrub par bya ba ma tshang ba yin no
T03D3817:213a-3: // de nyid kyi phyir gtan tshigs 'gal ba yin te /
T03D3817:213a-4: de las bzlog pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:213a-5: 'on te ci'i phyir gzhi gcig pa nyid tsam du
T03D3817:213a-6: sgrub pa de'i tshe grub pa sgrub pa yin te
T03D3817:213a-7: / des kyang rgyud gcig la yod pas bcings pa
T03D3817:213a-8: la sogs pa gnas gcig par 'dod pa nyid do
T03D3817:213a-9: / // 'di ltar gang gi tshe rgyud gang la
T03D3817:213a-10: ma rig pa la sogs pa rgyu dang 'bras bur
T03D3817:213a-11: gyur pa dag rgyun mi 'chad par rgyun du 'byung
T03D3817:213a-12: ba de'i tshe na ni de la bcings pa zhes
T03D3817:213a-13: / // 'dogs / yang de nyid la thos pa
T03D3817:213a-14: la sogs pa'i rim gyis 'phags pa'i lam skye nas
T03D3817:213a-15: ma rig pa la sogs pa 'gags pas gnas gyur
T03D3817:213a-16: pa la thar pa zhes 'dogs kyi /
T03D3817:213a-17: de gnyis don dam pa rtag pa gcig pu'i dngos po'i yul can du grub pa ni med de /
T03D3817:213a-18: 'jig rten pa'i bcings pa dang thar pa yang de dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:213a-19: rgyud gang la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems
T03D3817:213a-20: dang nyams su myong ba skyes pa de de nyid
T03D3817:213a-21: la dus gzhan na rgyud yongs su smin pa la
T03D3817:213a-22: brten nas ma du lung ga la sogs rgya skyegs
T03D3817:213a-23: la sogs pa'i khu bas bskus pa'i rgyud yongs su
T03D3817:213a-24: smin pa la sogs pa bzhin du bde ba dang
T03D3817:213a-26: dran pa la sogs pa 'bras bu 'byung ba snang
T03D3817:213a-27: ba'i phyir dge ba la sogs pa gnas gcig tu
T03D3817:213a-28: grags kyi byed pa po dang /
T03D3817:213a-30: dran pa po gcig pu ni gang yang med de /
T03D3817:213a-31: tha snyad btags pa 'di thams cad ni rgyu dang
T03D3817:213a-32: 'bras bu tsam gyis rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro
T03D3817:213a-33: // ha cang thal ba yang ma yin te /
T03D3817:213a-34: sa bon la sogs pa'i nus pa nges pa bzhin
T03D3817:213a-35: du rgyu'i nus pa so sor nges pa'i phyir ro
T03D3817:213a-36: // de la yang dag gang gis na rgyu dang
T03D3817:213a-37: 'bras bu'i dngos po so sor nges par 'gyur ba
T03D3817:213a-38: de ni gcig pu rjes su 'gro ba ni gang
T03D3817:213a-39: // yang med de / gnas skabs gzhan du snang ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:213a-40: sems can gyi rgyu 'di la yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur na /
T03D3817:213a-41: bdag tu yongs su brtags pa 'dis ci zhig bya /
T03D3817:213a-42: bdag la yang brtags te byed pa po la sogs pa'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de ni rgyu'o //
T03D3817:213a-43: zab mo la sogs pa'i gnas skabs gang yin pa
T03D3817:213a-44: de ni 'bras bu'o zhes rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos
T03D3817:213a-45: po gdon mi za bar khas blang par bya'o //
T03D3817:213b-0: de lta ma yin te gnas skabs de gnyis su @213b skye ba med pa'am /
T03D3817:213b-1: gcig la gcig la phan 'dogs pa med pa na
T03D3817:213b-2: nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gyur pas za ba po
T03D3817:213b-3: la sogs pa 'grub par yang ji ltar 'gyur /
T03D3817:213b-4: nus pa so sor nges par khas blang bar bya ste /
T03D3817:213b-5: 'di ltar so sor nges pa'i bdag nyid dang 'brel
T03D3817:213b-6: pas bde ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur gyi
T03D3817:213b-7: thams cad la ni ma yin no //
T03D3817:213b-8: de bas na dge ba la sogs pa rgyu dang
T03D3817:213b-9: 'bras bur gyur pa ji ltar yongs su snang ba
T03D3817:213b-10: dag kho na byed pa po dang za ba po
T03D3817:213b-11: yin na bltar mi snang ba'i ngo bo bdag yongs

T03D3817:220a-10: med par 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
T03D3817:220a-11: kun rdzob tu yod par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:220a-12: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i gnas skabs na sgyu ma
T03D3817:220a-13: lta bur dmigs pa'i phyir thams cad du dmigs pa
T03D3817:220a-14: med pa yang ma yin no //
T03D3817:220a-15: de'i tshe na yang mos pa las byung ba'i dmigs par ni rnam par gzhag go //
T03D3817:220a-16: mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas skabs na ni shin tu dmigs pa med pa kho na ste /
T03D3817:220a-17: de'i tshe na ni sbyin pa la sogs par 'jug par khas mi len gyi /
T03D3817:220a-18: dang po sbyor ba'i gnas skabs sam //
T03D3817:220a-19: langs pa rnams la bya bas klan kar mi rung ngo //
T03D3817:220a-20: 'dis ni 'bras bu che ba'i phyir pha rol tu
T03D3817:220a-21: phyin pa la sbyor ba'i rgya che ba brjod do
T03D3817:220a-22: // kun rdzob tu rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po
T03D3817:220a-23: nye bar ston pas skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha' bkag
T03D3817:220a-25: rnam pa gsum gyis na bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te /
T03D3817:220a-26: thams cad du song ba dang /
T03D3817:220a-29: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams bskyed pas thams cad du song ba ste /
T03D3817:220a-30: 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams ni mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i gnas skabs bskyed do //
T03D3817:220a-31: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas skabs so //
T03D3817:220a-32: khyad zhugs par khyad par du 'gro bas rgya che ba'o //
T03D3817:220a-33: 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur bas mi zad pa'o //
T03D3817:220a-34: gal te de med pa'i phyir gzugs la mi gnas
T03D3817:220a-35: pa sbyin pa sbyin par bya na de'i tshe byang
T03D3817:220a-36: chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku
T03D3817:220a-37: thob par 'dod pas sbyin pa la sogs pa la
T03D3817:220a-38: ji ltar 'jug par bya zhes brgal du dogs nas
T03D3817:220a-39: / rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems zhes bya
T03D3817:220b-0: ba la sogs pas gzugs @220b kyi sku thob par
T03D3817:220b-2: 'dir don gyis na gzugs kyi sku la de bzhin
T03D3817:220b-3: gshegs par mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyi mtshan nyid mi
T03D3817:220b-5: mtshan phun sum tshogs pa zhes mtshan ma tsam zhig
T03D3817:220b-6: yongs su brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi
T03D3817:220b-7: sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa mtha'
T03D3817:220b-9: de la mtshan rnams ni phyag dang zhabs la 'khor
T03D3817:220b-10: lo mnga' ba la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis
T03D3817:220b-11: te / tshig mangs kyis dogs bas ma bris kyi
T03D3817:220b-12: mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du khong du
T03D3817:220b-13: chud par gyis shig / de dag kyang yul na
T03D3817:220b-14: te / gnas pa dang / gsal ba dang /
T03D3817:220b-15: rdzogs pas phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T03D3817:220b-16: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dag ni sen mo zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3817:220b-17: mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du shes par gyis shig
T03D3817:220b-18: / mtshan la sogs pa de dag kyang sgyu mas
T03D3817:220b-19: sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bzhin du brdzun pa'i
T03D3817:220b-20: phyir ro // de bas na gzugs kyi sku rnam
T03D3817:220b-21: pa de lta bu la 'dun pa dang smon lam
T03D3817:220b-22: gyis gnas par bya'o zhes ston to //
T03D3817:220b-23: 'di ltar mtshan de dag kyang rdul phra rab bsags pa'i ngo bo nyid dam /
T03D3817:220b-24: des brtsams pa yan lag can gyi gzugs zhig tu gyur grang na /
T03D3817:220b-25: re zhig phyogs dang po ni ma yin te /
T03D3817:220b-26: rdul phra rab rnams sngar bshig zin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:220b-27: gnyis pa yang ma yin no //
T03D3817:220b-28: rtsom par byed pa med na des na brtsams pa yan lag can yang med pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3817:220b-29: sgrib pa la sogs pa 'gal ba'i chos sngar bshad pa dag dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:220b-30: de'i phyir smras pa las dgongs pa gsungs te /
T03D3817:220b-31: de la brtags nas rab 'byor gyis /
T03D3817:220b-32: de ni ma lags te zhes gsal to //
T03D3817:220b-33: gal te mtshan rnams brdzun pa nyid yin na 'o
T03D3817:220b-34: na bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde de dang de
T03D3817:220b-35: dag slas mtshan rnams gsungs snyam du bsams shing /
T03D3817:220b-36: de ci'i slad du zhes dris pa dang /
T03D3817:220b-37: de nyid mtshan phun sum tshogs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smras te /
T03D3817:220b-38: mtshan phun sum tshogs pa de don dam par gsungs pa ni ma yin gyi /
T03D3817:220b-39: sgyu mas sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin du des brdzun
T03D3817:220b-40: pa'i ngo bo kho nar gsungs so zhes bya ba'i
T03D3817:221a-1: pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don de nyid bcom
T03D3817:221a-2: ldan 'das kyis bskang ba'i phyir ji tsam du zhes
T03D3817:221a-3: bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3817:221a-4: ji tsam du mtshan phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya
T03D3817:221a-5: ba ni don dam par ni ji tsam du mtshan
T03D3817:221a-6: phun sum tshogs par mngon par zhen pa de tsam
T03D3817:221a-7: du log par mngon par zhen pa yin no zhes
T03D3817:221a-9: sngar ji skad bstan pa bzhin no //
T03D3817:221a-10: ji tsam du mtshan phun sum tshogs pa med pa
T03D3817:221a-11: zhes bya ba ni bzlog ste bshad par khong du
T03D3817:221a-12: chud par bya'o // 'dis ni 'di la rnal 'byor
T03D3817:221a-13: la snyoms par 'jug pas ji ltar bsgrub par bya
T03D3817:221a-15: /'di la ji ltar mtha' gnyis spangs nas sems rab tu gzung bar bya ba de ston te /
T03D3817:221a-16: de ltar zhes bya ba ni sgyu mas sprul pa'i
T03D3817:221a-17: sangs rgyas bzhin du mtshan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
T03D3817:221a-18: blta bar bya'o // 'dis ni skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' sel te /
T03D3817:221a-19: kun rdzob tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs kyi sku la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:221a-20: mtshan med pa ni don dam par blta bar bya ste /
T03D3817:221a-21: mtshan gang yang grub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:221a-22: 'dis ni sgro btags pa'i mtha' bsal to //
T03D3817:221a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku thob par bya
T03D3817:221a-24: ba'i phyir smon lam 'debs pas ni rgya che ba
T03D3817:221a-25: brjod do // de mi dmigs pas ni zab pa'o //
T03D3817:221a-26: gzugs kyi sku thob par 'dun pa'i gnas bshad zin to //
T03D3817:221a-27: chos kyi sku ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T03D3817:221a-28: bshad pa'i chos kyi sku dang /
T03D3817:221a-30: rtogs pa'i chos kyi sku yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T03D3817:221a-31: ye shes kyi rgyu can dang /
T03D3817:221a-32: bsod nams kyi rgyu can no //
T03D3817:221a-33: de la ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo snyigs ma lnga shas che ba'i phyir dang /
T03D3817:221a-34: chos dkon mchog 'di 'dra ba yang 'bras bu shin
T03D3817:221a-35: tu zab cing rgya che ba'i phyir bshad pa'i chos
T03D3817:221a-36: kyi sku la yid mi ches su dogs nas mchis
T03D3817:221a-38: mchis lags sam zhes bya ba'i tshig ni ci sems
T03D3817:221a-39: can gang la la dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde'i
T03D3817:221a-40: chos bshad pa la yang dag par 'du shes bskyed
T03D3817:221a-41: par 'gyur ba 'byung ba dag ces bya ba'i tshig
T03D3817:221a-42: gi don de dang sbyar ro //
T03D3817:221a-43: lnga brgya tha ma zhes bya ba la brgya phrag lnga'i tshogs ni lnga brgya ste /
T03D3817:221b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan @221b pa lnga brgya phrag
T03D3817:221b-1: lnga'i bar du gnas zhes grags pas de'i phyir tham
T03D3817:221b-2: zhes bye brag tu mdzad de /
T03D3817:221b-3: de'i tshe snyigs ma lnga po dag ni shas che ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:221b-4: dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa ni mos pa dang /
T03D3817:221b-10: sems pa la sogs pa nyams pa'o //
T03D3817:221b-11: 'di lta bu zhes bya ba ni don zab cing rgya che ba'o //
T03D3817:221b-12: mdo sde'i tshig ces bya ba ni mdo sde bstan pa'i ngag rnams te /
T03D3817:221b-13: 'di dag gis don rtogs par byed /
T03D3817:221b-14: shes par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:221b-15: mtshan ma tsam yongs su brjod pa 'di bshad pa'i chos kyi sku mtha' dag yongs su ston to //
T03D3817:221b-16: yang na mdo sde'i tshig dag ni brjod par bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3817:221b-17: bshad pa 'dir ni 'di lta bu zhes bya ba
T03D3817:221b-18: ni zab cing rgya che ba zhes bya bar sbyar
T03D3817:221b-19: ro // bshad pa dag la zhes bya ba ni
T03D3817:221b-20: dang po ltar ni brjod pa rnams la zhes bya'o
T03D3817:221b-21: ro // // gnyis pa la ni don ston pa rnams la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3817:221b-22: don la phyin ci ma log par 'du shes pa
T03D3817:221b-23: ni 'dir yang dag par 'du shes pa yin gyi
T03D3817:221b-24: / sgra ji bzhin du mngon par zhen nas 'di
T03D3817:221b-25: yang dag pa'o snyam du 'du shes pa la mi
T03D3817:221b-26: / bya'o // 'dis ni don grub na yang dag
T03D3817:221b-27: pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes sel bar byed do
T03D3817:221b-28: / bya'o // // thams cad du yang thogs pa
T03D3817:221b-29: med par mkhyen pa'i phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ba de
T03D3817:221b-30: dag bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum dang 'dra bar
T03D3817:221b-31: gzigs nas rab 'byor gyi dogs pa de bsal ba'i
T03D3817:221b-33: sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ni de dag
T03D3817:221b-34: gi byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan yang dag par
T03D3817:221b-36: de dag kyang bsgrub pa ji lta bu dang /
T03D3817:221b-37: rgyu ji lta bus yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
T03D3817:221b-38: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang /
T03D3817:221b-39: yang dag par 'du shes pa ji lta bus 'du
T03D3817:221b-40: shes su 'gyur ba de bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs
T03D3817:221b-41: su ston te / tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon
T03D3817:221b-42: tan dang ldan pa shes rab dang ldan pa zhes
T03D3817:221b-43: bya ba 'dis ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang /
T03D3817:221b-45: lhag pa'i shes rab dang go rims bzhin te /
T03D3817:221b-46: bslab pa gsum bsgrub pa dang ldan par ston to //
T03D3817:222a-1: dang shes rab logs shig du smos pa yon tan ni 'dir bsam gtan las byung ba bzung ste /
T03D3817:222a-2: ba lang dang glang zhes bya ba'i tshul du'o //
T03D3817:222a-3: phyi ma'i dus nyon mongs pa can de lta bu
T03D3817:222a-4: ni tshul khrims la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan
T03D3817:222a-5: pa ji ltar 'byung snyam pa la /
T03D3817:222a-6: rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3817:222a-7: bsnyen bkur byas pa ni na bza' dang zhal zas la sogs pas bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /
T03D3817:222a-8: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pas mchod pa'o //
T03D3817:222a-9: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni gdams ngag dang
T03D3817:222a-10: rjes su bstan pa spyi bos blangs nas tshul khrims
T03D3817:222a-11: la sogs pa yon tan phun sum tshogs pa la
T03D3817:222a-12: nan tan byed pa'i sgo nas blta bar bya'o //
T03D3817:222a-13: de bas kyang de dag ches dge ba mang du stsogs pas brjod pa'i phyir /
T03D3817:222a-14: sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dang zhes bya ba smos te /
T03D3817:222a-15: 'dis ni de dag gi rgyu yang dag par 'grub pa bstan to //
T03D3817:222a-16: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen to zhes bya ba ni bsam pa dang ming ngo //
T03D3817:222a-17: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs zhes bya ba ni lus so //
T03D3817:222a-18: 'dis ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa ston to //
T03D3817:222a-19: de yang yang dag par zhugs pa rnams spro bar bya ba dang /
T03D3817:222a-20: log par zhugs pa rnams ngo tsha bskyed pa'i phyir gsungs so //
T03D3817:222a-21: de lta ma yin na bcom ldan 'das thams cad
T03D3817:222a-22: mkhyen pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen to zhes bstan pa
T03D3817:222a-23: dang bye brag ci zhig yod par bstan par 'gyur
T03D3817:222a-24: / yang na de ni de dag skal ba yod
T03D3817:222a-25: par de bstan pa gtso bor mdzad par blta ste
T03D3817:222a-26: / / skal ba yod par mkhyen zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3817:222a-27: de'i phyir de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po
T03D3817:222a-28: yongs su sdud par bstan pa'i phyir sems can de
T03D3817:222a-29: dag thams cad ni zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T03D3817:222a-30: skyed ces bya ba ni bsod nams 'byung ba'i dus so //
T03D3817:222a-31: yongs su sdud ces bya ba ni dgag pa'i dus na de'i bag chags yongs su 'dzin pa'o //
T03D3817:222a-32: 'di mtha' dag gis ni yang dag pa ma yin
T03D3817:222a-33: pa'i 'du shes bsal nas yang dag pa'i 'du shes
T03D3817:222a-34: bskyed pa la 'dun pa dang smon lam gnyis kyis
T03D3817:222a-35: gnas par bya bar bstan la /
T03D3817:222a-36: gnas 'di'i rgya che ba yongs su bstan to //
T03D3817:222b-0: de ci'i slad du zhes bya ba de @222b dag
T03D3817:222b-1: sangs rgyas 'bum phrag du ma la bsnyen bkur byas
T03D3817:222b-2: par 'gyur ba ji ltar shes par byed pa'i gtan
T03D3817:222b-3: tshigs yongs su zhus pa dang /
T03D3817:222b-4: 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3817:222b-5: 'di ni rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa'i ji
T03D3817:222b-6: ltar bsgrub par bya ba de yongs su bstan to
T03D3817:222b-8: nga'o snyam du bdag yod par 'dzin pa de ni bdag tu 'du shes pa'o //
T03D3817:222b-9: bdag gi yod par 'dzin pa ni sems can du 'du shes pa'o //
T03D3817:222b-10: bdag de nyid kyi tshe ji srid gnas par yongs su 'dzin pa ni srog tu 'du shes pa'o //
T03D3817:222b-11: yang dang yang 'gro ba dag tu 'gro bar 'dzin pa ni gang zag tu 'du shes pa'o //
T03D3817:222b-12: gal te bdag la sogs pa 'du shes med na
T03D3817:222b-13: nyan thos la sogs pa bzhin du gzugs la sogs
T03D3817:222b-14: pa chos su 'du shes yod dam snyam pa la
T03D3817:222b-15: chos su 'du shes pa ma yin zhes bya ba
T03D3817:222b-16: gsungs te / don dam par chos gang yang med pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa'o //
T03D3817:222b-17: 'o na med par 'du shes te ci chad par
T03D3817:222b-18: smra ba rnams kyi lta bu zhig yod dam snyam
T03D3817:222b-19: pa la chos med par yang 'du shes mi 'jug
T03D3817:222b-21: kun rdzob tu ma brtags na dga' bar chos rnams
T03D3817:222b-22: yod pa'i phyir re zhig kun rdzob kyi lam la
T03D3817:222b-23: gnas pa rnams la chos med par 'du shes pa
T03D3817:222b-24: rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no //
T03D3817:222b-25: don dam pa'i ye shes la gnas pa rnams la yang ma yin te /
T03D3817:222b-26: de'i tshe na gang zhig bkag pas chos med par
T03D3817:222b-27: 'du shes 'jug par 'gyur ba chos gang yang mi
T03D3817:222b-29: de ni chos su 'dzin pa med na med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:222b-30: yul med par dgag par ni gang na yang mi srid do //
T03D3817:222b-31: de la dper na rnam par rig pa tsam du
T03D3817:222b-32: bden kyang 'di rnam par rig byed tsam nyid do
T03D3817:222b-33: snyam du rnam par rtogs na rnam par rig pa
T03D3817:222b-34: tsam nyid la gnas pa yin pa de bzhin du
T03D3817:222b-35: chos med pa bden yang chos med par rtogs na
T03D3817:222b-36: de la gnas mi srid pas thams cad mtshungs so
T03D3817:222b-37: // gal te bdag la sogs pa med na de
T03D3817:222b-38: dag der 'du shes mi 'jug kyang 'di ni bdag
T03D3817:222b-39: kyang gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ming tsam
T03D3817:223a-1: snyam du de dag ming la mngon par zhen pa'i
T03D3817:223a-2: 'du shes su 'gyur ro snyam pa la 'du shes
T03D3817:223a-3: dang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T03D3817:223a-4: ming ni gzugs kyi phung por gtogs pa'i phyir gzugs
T03D3817:223a-5: la sogs pa bzhin du brdzun pa kho na yin
T03D3817:223a-6: la ldan pa ma yin pa yang btags par yod
T03D3817:223a-7: pa'i phyir ro // de'i phyir 'du shes pa yang
T03D3817:223a-8: phyin ci log tu mngon par zhen pa nyid do
T03D3817:223a-9: pa'i phyir ro // zhes dgongs pa'o // gal te
T03D3817:223a-10: de lta na de'i gnas skabs na 'du shes thams
T03D3817:223a-11: cad dang bral bas shi ba dang /
T03D3817:223a-12: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mi bzhin du rnal
T03D3817:223a-13: 'byor pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro snyam pa
T03D3817:223a-14: la ; 'du shes med pa yang 'jug par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T03D3817:223a-15: de'i tshe na gang gis de dag rnal 'byor par
T03D3817:223a-16: 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i ye shes yang dag pa'i
T03D3817:223a-17: kun rdzob kyi ngo bo nyid ni yod do //
T03D3817:223a-18: de las langs pa na de las dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes 'byung ngo//
T03D3817:223a-19: de lta ma yin na ni de rgyu med pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
T03D3817:223a-20: gal te rnal 'byor pa'i ye shes kun rdzob kyi
T03D3817:223a-21: ngo bo nyid de sus khong du chud ces gtan
T03D3817:223a-23: ci ltar gang zag la bdag med par rtogs pa
T03D3817:223a-24: rang rig pas rang la yod pa'i gang zag la
T03D3817:223a-25: bdag med par rtogs pa de bzhin du 'dir yang
T03D3817:223a-26: mtshungs so // ye shes dang rig pa kun rdzob
T03D3817:223a-27: tu yang khas mi blang ba yang ma yin no
T03D3817:223a-28: mtshungs so // // rnal 'byor pas rang gi mtshan
T03D3817:223a-29: nyid so sor mngon du byas nas de la yod
T03D3817:223a-30: pa'i bdag med pa'i dmigs pa ma yin te /
T03D3817:223a-31: de'i tshe 'das pa la sogs pa ni mi nye ba dang mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:223a-32: 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
T03D3817:223a-33: rang bzhin ma yin pa rnam par dpyad pas yul
T03D3817:223a-34: du 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad spyir bdag med par
T03D3817:223a-35: bsdus te rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa de

T03D3817:233a-10: gang yang rung ba gnas so zhes gang gsungs pa'o

T03D3817:233a-12: brjod pa khyad par rnam pa gnyis kyis khyad par
T03D3817:233a-13: du 'phags par yongs su bstan te /
T03D3817:233a-14: dngos po'i khyad par dang zhing gi khyad par ro //
T03D3817:233a-15: dngos po'i khyad par du 'phags pa yang rgya che ba dang /
T03D3817:233a-17: de la rgya che ba ni gzhi'i bye brag gis rab tu mang ba ste /
T03D3817:233a-18: 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed cig ces gang gsungs pa'o //
T03D3817:233a-19: gya nom pa ni 'jig rten na shin du dkon par grags pa ste /
T03D3817:233a-20: rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te zhes gsungs pa'o //
T03D3817:233a-21: zhing ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
T03D3817:233a-22: de la gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa ni spang bar bya ba dang /
T03D3817:233a-23: blang bar bya ba'i don gzhan dag la phyin ci ma log par ston pa'i phyir te /
T03D3817:233a-24: de bzhin gshegs pas zhes gsungs pa'o //
T03D3817:233a-25: de dngos po'i de kho na de ji lta ba
T03D3817:233a-26: bzhin du gsungs pas nges pa'i tshig tu na de
T03D3817:233a-27: bzhin du gsungs pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3817:233a-28: bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa ni ye shes
T03D3817:233a-29: dang spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa tha dad pas
T03D3817:233a-31: de la dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan te /
T03D3817:233a-32: nyon mongs pa'i dgra bcom pas nges pa'i tshig tu na dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3817:233a-33: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba
T03D3817:233a-34: 'dis ni ye shes phun sum tshogs pa bstan to
T03D3817:233a-35: // de'i phyir tshig gsum smos pa 'bras bu dang
T03D3817:233a-36: bcas pa yin no zhes spyir bsdu ba'i don to
T03D3817:233a-37: // // mos par bya zhes bya ba na 'dod pa ste /
T03D3817:233a-38: mos pa bskyed par bya'o khong du chud par bya'o
T03D3817:233a-39: zhes bya ba ni rtogs par bya ba ste shes
T03D3817:233a-40: rab bskyed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3817:233b-0: 'di la snga ma ni phyi ma'i @233b 'bras bu'o //
T03D3817:233b-1: yang na phyi ma ni snga ma'i bshad pa'o //
T03D3817:233b-2: bshad ces bya ba ni sgra'o //
T03D3817:233b-3: yang dag par bstan zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa ste mos pa bskyed pa'i don to //
T03D3817:233b-4: grangs med ces bya ba ni grangs kyis yongs su gcad par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:233b-5: dpag tu med ces bya ba ni mthu dpag par mi nus pa'am dpe med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:233b-6: 'don zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid yi ge kha ton du byed pa'o //
T03D3817:233b-7: ston zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag la tshig gi don yang dag par ston pa'o //
T03D3817:233b-8: yang na 'don pa ni tshig go //
T03D3817:233b-10: mchod rten du gyur zhes bya ba ni phyag bya bar 'os pa'o //
T03D3817:233b-11: mchod rten nyid mchod rten du gyur pa ste /
T03D3817:233b-12: dper na dbang du gyur ces bya ba bzhin no //
T03D3817:233b-13: 'di ltar gang zag la bdag med pa tsam gyi
T03D3817:233b-14: tshigs su bcad pa bstan pas kyang mchod rten du
T03D3817:233b-15: gyur pa yin na bdag med pa gnyi ga bstan
T03D3817:233b-16: pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du dgongs pa'o
T03D3817:233b-17: // len pa zhes bya ba ni tshig go //
T03D3817:233b-18: 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni mi brjed pa'o //
T03D3817:233b-19: klog ces bya ba ni glegs bam du byas pa'o //
T03D3817:233b-20: kun chub bar byed ces bya ba ni don to /
T03D3817:233b-21: 'dis ni thos pa la byung ba'i shes rab kyis 'dzin par bstan to //
T03D3817:233b-22: bsam pa dang bsam pa'i shes rab kyis kyang 'dzin pa'i phyir tshul bzhin zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T03D3817:233b-23: don phyin ci ma log par khong du chud ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3817:233b-24: kha cig las ni 'dzin zhes bya ba'i tshig gcig po 'byung ste /
T03D3817:233b-25: de la 'dzin pa ni tshig dang don gnyi gar blta bar bya'o //
T03D3817:233b-26: ngo mtshar rab ces bya ba ni chos zab cing
T03D3817:233b-27: rgya che ba rnam pa 'di lta bu khong du
T03D3817:233b-29: ston pa gnas zhes bya ba ni chos smra ba ste /
T03D3817:233b-30: ston pa'i mdzad pa mdzad pa'i phyir te /
T03D3817:233b-31: de nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du
T03D3817:233b-32: bzhugs pa dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
T03D3817:233b-33: // bla ma lta bu gang yang rung ba zhes
T03D3817:233b-34: bya ba ni 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs la sogs
T03D3817:233b-35: pa gang yang rung ba ste /
T03D3817:233b-36: de'i mdzad pa bsgrub pa'i phyir chos smra ba de gnas par blta'o //
T03D3817:233b-37: kha cig las ni gzhan dang gzhan dag ces tshig gnyis 'byung ste /
T03D3817:233b-38: de ni bla ma lta bu gang yang rung thams cad kyi rnam grangs te /
T03D3817:233b-39: de na gnas zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:233b-40: 'di thams cad kyis ni gnas 'di'i rgya che ba bstan to //
T03D3817:233b-41: don gyis na dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba
T03D3817:233b-42: btang nas phyi'i bstan bcos la rjes su chags pa
T03D3817:234a-1: phyogs su yongs su bstan te /
T03D3817:234a-2: de la rjes su chags pa yongs su btang la
T03D3817:234a-3: chos la brtson par bya ba la 'dun pa dang
T03D3817:234a-4: / smon lam btang ba bstan to //
T03D3817:234a-5: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las zhes bya ba mtshan
T03D3817:234a-6: ma tsam zhig smos pas phyi'i bstan bcos la rjes
T03D3817:234a-8: dam pa'i chos thams cad la brtson par bya'o zhes yongs su ston to //
T03D3817:234a-9: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nus pa bsam gyis mi
T03D3817:234a-10: khyab pa dang ldan pas gzhan la phan gdags pa'i
T03D3817:234a-11: don du ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems can
T03D3817:234a-12: rnams kyi bsod nams skye bar brjod pa'i phyir 'phags
T03D3817:234a-13: pa rab 'byor gyis 'di'i ming ci lags zhes zhus
T03D3817:234a-14: so // 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya
T03D3817:234a-15: ba 'di ni bzung bas kyang bsod nams dpag tu
T03D3817:234a-16: med par 'gyur bar yongs su ston to //
T03D3817:234a-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya
T03D3817:234a-18: ba ni gang gi ming de yin pa de la
T03D3817:234a-20: 'dis shes rab kyang yin la pha rol rtogs shing yongs su gcod pas pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03D3817:234a-21: de ni shes rab kyang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa yang yin na zhes bsdu ba'o //
T03D3817:234a-22: yang na shes rab kyi pha rol ni shes rab
T03D3817:234a-23: kyi pha rol te de 'dis rtogs shing yongs su
T03D3817:234a-24: gcod pas na de skad ces bya'o //
T03D3817:234a-25: de yang shugs kyis na de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes
T03D3817:234a-26: rab rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa
T03D3817:234a-27: ste / shes rab gzhan gyis na pha rol gzhal bar mi nus so //
T03D3817:234a-28: yang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3817:234a-29: ni son to zhes bya ba'i tha tshig 'di nyid
T03D3817:234a-30: do // de ni ji skad smos pa'i shes rab kho na ste /
T03D3817:234a-31: gzhan ni de'i pha rol tu 'gro mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:234a-32: 'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa yang bshad pa yin no //
T03D3817:234a-33: de brjod par 'gyur bas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang de skad ces bya ste /
T03D3817:234a-34: rol rnyed ma phrogs pa la sogs pa snyan dngags sbyar ba bzhin no //
T03D3817:234a-35: de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis so so rang gis
T03D3817:234a-36: rig par bya ba nyid yin pas thun mong ma
T03D3817:234a-38: de don dam par yang ma skyes pa'i phyir de
T03D3817:234a-39: sgras brjod mi srid do snyam du sems pa'i bsam
T03D3817:234a-40: pa las brtags nas de ci'i slad du zhes zhus
T03D3817:234a-41: pa dang / lan du rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs
T03D3817:234a-42: pas shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa gang gsungs
T03D3817:234a-43: pa de zhes bya ba bka' stsal to //
T03D3817:234b-0: de @234b don dam pa so so rang gis rig
T03D3817:234b-1: par bya ba yin pas thun mong ma yin pa'i
T03D3817:234b-2: phyir dang / don dam par chos thams cad shin
T03D3817:234b-3: tu ma skyes pa'i phyir sgras brjod du mi rung
T03D3817:234b-4: phyir dang / mod kyi / 'on kyang rnam par
T03D3817:234b-5: rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi rang gi ngo bo la
T03D3817:234b-6: phyi rol tu sgro btags te /
T03D3817:234b-7: rnam par rtog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis 'khrul
T03D3817:234b-8: pa yin pas des sgro btags pa'i rnam pa de
T03D3817:234b-10: des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3817:234b-11: rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan du gyur pa gang
T03D3817:234b-12: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs shing sgras go bar byas
T03D3817:234b-13: pa de nyid pha rol tu phyin pa med pa
T03D3817:234b-14: yin gyi / de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab ni ma yin te /
T03D3817:234b-15: de ni bden pa'i kun rdzob tu shes bya'i pa rol tu son pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:234b-16: de lta ma yin na bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen par ji ltar 'gyur /
T03D3817:234b-17: rtogs par byed pa 'khrul pas de dang rnam par
T03D3817:234b-18: rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan du gyur pa tha dad par
T03D3817:234b-19: khong du mi chud pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:234b-20: des shes pa'i ngo bor don dam pa'i shes rab de nyid de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs zhes bya'o //
T03D3817:234b-21: des na de ltar bstan pa la 'gal ba med do snyam du dgongs pa'o //
T03D3817:234b-22: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab gang yin
T03D3817:234b-23: pa rtogs par byed pa'i ngo bor de bzhin gshegs
T03D3817:234b-24: pas gsungs pa de nyid don dam par med pa
T03D3817:234b-25: kho na ste / de don dam par na pha rol tu 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:234b-26: nyid ces bya ba'i sgra ni pha rol tu phyin
T03D3817:234b-27: pa med ces bya ba'i 'og tu gzhag par blta'o
T03D3817:234b-28: // 'dis ni don dam par rnam par 'jog cing
T03D3817:234b-29: de la rnal 'byor du snyoms par 'jug pas ji
T03D3817:234b-30: ltar bsgrub par bya ba yongs su bstan to //
T03D3817:234b-31: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3817:234b-32: rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi rang gi ngo
T03D3817:234b-33: bo kho na la phyi rol tu sgro btags nas
T03D3817:234b-35: gzhan du ni ma yin pa de bzhin chos thams
T03D3817:234b-36: cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs par bstan pa'i
T03D3817:234b-37: phyir rab 'byor 'di ci snyam du sems zhes bya
T03D3817:234b-38: ba gsungs te / don dam par chos thams cad grub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:234b-39: grub tu chud na yang rang gi mtshan nyid rnams
T03D3817:234b-40: ni thun mong ma yin pas brda gdags mi nus
T03D3817:234b-41: pa'i phyir ro // spyi'i mtshan nyid ni btags pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:235a-1: nyid dang spyi'i mtshan nyid las ma gtogs par brjod par bya ba gzhan ni med de /
T03D3817:235a-2: de gnyis phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:235a-3: de lta bas na don dam par gang de bzhin
T03D3817:235a-4: gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos de gang yang med par
T03D3817:235a-5: dgongs pa'i gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das
T03D3817:235a-6: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos de gang yang
T03D3817:235a-7: ma mchis so zhes gsol to //
T03D3817:235a-8: 'dis ni rnam par g-yeng ba tshar bcad pa dang /
T03D3817:235a-10: de ltar chos thams cad la bdag med par rgya
T03D3817:235a-11: cher bstan du zin kyang las dang po pa gang
T03D3817:235a-12: dag 'di snyam du ji ltar chos thams cad bdag
T03D3817:235a-13: med par bsgom snyam sems pa de dag dngos po'i
T03D3817:235a-14: mtshan ma zil gyis gnon pa la thabs mi mkhas
T03D3817:235a-15: pa dang dbral ba'i phyir gnas bcu pa'i dbang du
T03D3817:235a-16: mdzad nas / rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3817:235a-17: 'di la thabs rnam pa gnyis kyis gcig dang du
T03D3817:235a-18: ma'i rang bzhin dang bral bar khong du chud pas
T03D3817:235a-19: chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o zhes
T03D3817:235a-20: ston to // de la thabs rnam pa gnyis ni bsab par bya ba'i thabs dang /
T03D3817:235a-21: snang ba med par bya ba'i thabs so //
T03D3817:235a-22: de la sna'i rdul ji snyed yod pa zhes bya
T03D3817:235a-23: ba 'dis ni gcig pu'i rang bzhin dang bral bar
T03D3817:235a-24: khong du chud na bsrab par bya ba'i thabs yin
T03D3817:235a-25: par ston te / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni gcig pur rigs pa ma yin te /
T03D3817:235a-26: bsgribs pa dang ma bsgribs pa la sogs pa gsal ba'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:235a-27: des na du mar bshig na rdul phra rab bshig par khas blang bar bya'o//
T03D3817:235a-28: de'i phyir rdul phra rab tu bsgom na gcig pu nyid du spong bar 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
T03D3817:235a-29: byang chub sems dpa' phal cher dmigs pa chung ngu
T03D3817:235a-30: ma yin pa yid la byed pas stong gsum gyi
T03D3817:235a-31: stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la dmigs pa'i
T03D3817:235a-32: phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po zhes smos so
T03D3817:235a-33: // 'dis ni rgya che ba yongs su bstan te /
T03D3817:235a-34: rdul phra rab de dag kyang phyogs cha'i bye brag
T03D3817:235a-35: gis tha mi dad pa'i phyir grub pa med pa
T03D3817:235a-37: ji ltar rdul de mang por 'gyur zhes rgol ba'i
T03D3817:235a-38: bsam pa las brtags nas ci'i slad du zhes gsol
T03D3817:235a-39: nas / 'dir lan du sa'i rdul gang lags pa de zhes bya ba de gsol to //
T03D3817:235b-0: sa'i rdul @235b de mang po gcig pa nyid du
T03D3817:235b-1: 'dzin pa gsal ba'i phyir rdul phra rab kyi ngo
T03D3817:235b-2: bor gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni rdul med
T03D3817:235b-4: don dam par na sgyu mas sprul pa'i ngo bo
T03D3817:235b-5: bzhin du rdul phra rab med pa kho na las
T03D3817:235b-6: blos rab tu brtags pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir
T03D3817:235b-7: ro // 'dis ni gcig pur 'dzin pa'i thabs tsam
T03D3817:235b-8: du gsungs par zad kyi don dam par ni ma
T03D3817:235b-9: ro // yin no // des na sa'i rdul zhes
T03D3817:235b-10: bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni de rigs pa'i kun rdzob
T03D3817:235b-12: de lta ma yin na don dam par de med pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3817:235b-13: rang gi mtshan nyid ni brjod du mi rung ba'i
T03D3817:235b-14: phyir brjod par mi 'gyur ro snyam pa kho nar
T03D3817:235b-15: dgongs pa'o // brjod pa'i kun rdzob tu de bstan par yang mi rigs te /
T03D3817:235b-16: de'i rang gi ngo bo ni gzhan yang mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:235b-17: 'dis ni du ma'i rang bzhin dang bral bar khong
T03D3817:235b-18: du chud pa'i thabs ni snang ba med par bya
T03D3817:235b-20: 'di ltar mjug tu phra rab rnams kyang rigs pas so sor btags nas snang bar byed pas na /
T03D3817:235b-21: 'jig rten gyi khams rnams du ma'i rang bzhin dang
T03D3817:235b-22: bral bar rtogs par 'gyur zhing de'i 'og tu rang
T03D3817:235b-23: bzhin med par khong du chud do //
T03D3817:235b-24: de ltar re zhig snod kyi 'jig rten gcig dang
T03D3817:235b-25: du ma'i rang bzhin dang bral bas rang bzhin ni
T03D3817:235b-26: med pa kho nar brjod nas sems can gyi 'jig
T03D3817:235b-28: 'jig rten gyi khams gang lags pa de zhes bya ba gsol to //
T03D3817:235b-29: 'jig rten gyi khams ni 'dir sems can gyi 'jig rten la dgongs pa ste /
T03D3817:235b-30: gzhan ni sngar bshad zin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:235b-31: de khams ma mchis par zhes bya ba de gcig
T03D3817:235b-32: dang du ma'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'i phyir ro
T03D3817:235b-34: 'di ltar re zhig de las gzugs kyi phung po
T03D3817:235b-35: gang yin pa de ni snod kyi 'jig rten nyid
T03D3817:235b-36: kyis bshad do // phung po lhag ma bzhi ni
T03D3817:235b-37: ji ltar gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin dang mi
T03D3817:235b-38: ldan par sngar dpyad pa nyid do //
T03D3817:235b-39: de lta ma yin pas na chos thams cad sgyu
T03D3817:235b-40: ma bzhin du don dam par rang bzhin med par
T03D3817:235b-41: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis mthong ngo //
T03D3817:235b-42: 'dis ni zab pa yang brjod do //
T03D3817:235b-43: don gyis na don dam par snod dang sems can
T03D3817:235b-44: gyi 'jig rten la dngos por mngon par zhen pa
T03D3817:235b-45: mi mthun pa'i phyogs su yongs su bstan to //
T03D3817:236a-2: smon lam gdab pa yang bstan te /
T03D3817:236a-3: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3817:236a-4: zhes mtshan ma tsam zhig yongs su brjod pas dngos
T03D3817:236a-5: po mtha' dag rang bzhin med par bsgom par yongs
T03D3817:236a-6: su ston to // de rdul ma mchis par zhes bya ba dang /
T03D3817:236a-7: khams ma mchis par zhes bya ba 'dis ni don
T03D3817:236a-8: dam par rnam par 'jog pa 'dis ni rnal 'byor
T03D3817:236a-9: du snyoms par 'jug pas ji ltar bsgrub par bya
T03D3817:236a-10: ba de yongs su bstan to //
T03D3817:236a-11: des na 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bgyi'o zhes bya
T03D3817:236a-12: ba 'dis ni skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha' bkag nas
T03D3817:236a-13: g-yeng ba tshar gcod pa bstan to //
T03D3817:236a-14: da ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bsod nams
T03D3817:236a-15: kyi tshogs bsgrubs pa'i shin tu phan 'dogs pas bcom
T03D3817:236a-16: ldan 'das la mchod pa na de'i sku rnam par
T03D3817:236a-17: mi 'jig pa de dag bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs
T03D3817:236a-19: yang dag pa yid la byed pa la ma zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:236a-20: de bas na de dag chogs ma bsags pa dang
T03D3817:236a-21: bral ba'i phyir gnas bcu gcig pa'i dbang du mdzad
T03D3817:236a-22: nas / rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3817:236a-23: 'dir spyir bsdu ba'i don ni 'di yin te /

T03D3817:242b-19: de dag tshogs zin kyang long ba gang yin pa
T03D3817:242b-20: des brgya lam na yang mi mthong ngo snyam du
T03D3817:242b-21: dogs nas mig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba gsungs
T03D3817:242b-22: te / de lta bur ni byang chub sems dpa' dngos por ma lhung bar blta bar bya'o //
T03D3817:242b-23: de ni ma rig pa'i mun pa nam langs shing /
T03D3817:242b-24: ye shes kyi nyi ma shar nas shes bya rnam
T03D3817:242b-25: pa sna tshogs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
T03D3817:242b-26: du mthong ste / phyin ci log gi dngos po
T03D3817:242b-27: sdug bsngal mtha' dag gi gnas sdug bsngal spang bar
T03D3817:242b-28: bya ba yang brdzun pa yin pas yongs su spong
T03D3817:242b-29: du mthong ste / / bde ba mtha' dag gi
T03D3817:242b-30: gnas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T03D3817:242b-31: byang chub kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa'i go 'phang
T03D3817:242b-32: blang bar bya ba yang 'dod de de la 'jug
T03D3817:242b-33: du mthong ste / / par rtsom mo // des
T03D3817:242b-34: na byang chub sems dpa' rnams longs spyod che ba
T03D3817:242b-35: phun sum tshogs pa rnyed nas /
T03D3817:242b-36: bla na med pa'i bde bas lus brtan te /
T03D3817:242b-37: byang chub las phyir mi ldog par dgongs pa'o //
T03D3817:242b-38: de nyid kyi phyir ldog par mi 'gyur te /
T03D3817:242b-39: sngar ni dmigs pa tsam gyis de la gnas pa zhes bstan /
T03D3817:242b-40: 'dir ni dmigs pa sngon du btang bas de la chags pa'i mtshan nyid du lhung ba'o //
T03D3817:242b-41: de'i phyir 'dir ni lhung ba smos so //
T03D3817:242b-42: snga mar ni gnas pa smos so //
T03D3817:243a-1: rab tu gzung ba bstan to //
T03D3817:243a-2: de ltar rnam pa 'dis bzod pa la btsud kyang
T03D3817:243a-3: gang dag bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar byed cing
T03D3817:243a-4: / de nyid la chags nas ye shes kyi tshogs
T03D3817:243a-5: yongs su bkang ba'i rgyu theg pa chen po'i chos
T03D3817:243a-6: la mi brtson pa de dag ye shes kyi tshogs
T03D3817:243a-7: dang mi ldan pa dang dbral ba'i phyir gnas bcu
T03D3817:243a-8: bzhi pa'i dbang du mdzad nas rab 'byor zhes bya
T03D3817:243a-9: ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3817:243a-10: gnas 'dis ni bsam gtan gyi ro myang ba dang dbral ba'i phyir /
T03D3817:243a-11: rnam pa lngas dam pa'i chos la brtson par bya
T03D3817:243a-12: ba'i yon tan gyi khyad par yongs su ston to
T03D3817:243a-13: // de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pa dang bsod nams
T03D3817:243a-14: khyad par du 'phags pa yongs su sdud pa dang
T03D3817:243a-16: de sgrub par byed pa la ston pa dang /
T03D3817:243a-17: lha la sogs pas rim gro byed pa dang /
T03D3817:243a-18: sdig pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3817:243a-19: de la de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pa ni de
T03D3817:243a-20: dag de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen zhes bya ba la
T03D3817:243a-21: sogs pa gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
T03D3817:243a-22: len zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig rnams kyi bshad pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T03D3817:243a-23: bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa dang /
T03D3817:243a-25: de la de dag la ya mtshan che ba ci
T03D3817:243a-26: yod snyam pa la brtags nas bsod nams yongs su
T03D3817:243a-27: sdud pa'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3817:243a-28: sems can de dag thams cad ces bya ba gsungs so //
T03D3817:243a-29: bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bskyed
T03D3817:243a-30: pas de dag skal ba yod par mkhyen to zhes
T03D3817:243a-32: de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i khyad par ci zhig
T03D3817:243a-33: yod pa gang gis na tshad med par 'gyur snyam
T03D3817:243a-35: bsod nams khyad par du 'phags pa yongs su sdud
T03D3817:243a-36: par bstan pa'i phyir yang rab 'byor skyes pa'am bud
T03D3817:243a-37: med gang zhig zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T03D3817:243a-40: sa dang chu la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi bye brag ni snga dro ste /
T03D3817:243a-41: de ltar gyur pa'i gnas skabs kyi bye brag kho
T03D3817:243a-42: na la dus zhes brtags kyi bye brag can la
T03D3817:243a-43: sogs pas yongs su brtags pa lta bu ni ma
T03D3817:243a-44: yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3817:243a-45: dus kyi sgra dang de ni gzhi mthun pas bye brag tu byas so //
T03D3817:243b-0: de lta ma yin na de gcig bu'i @243b ngo
T03D3817:243b-1: bo yin pas 'di ni snga dro zhes bya ba
T03D3817:243b-2: la sogs pa rnam par dbye ba med par 'gyur
T03D3817:243b-3: ro // gzhan gyi bye brag gis rnam par dbye
T03D3817:243b-4: bar khas len na bye brag de nyid nyi ma
T03D3817:243b-5: la sogs pa'i gnas kyi bye brag snga dro la
T03D3817:243b-6: sogs par tha snyad gdags pa'i rgyu yin na /
T03D3817:243b-7: cung zad kyang mi byed la mthu ma mthong ba'i
T03D3817:243b-8: dus brtags te ci zhig bya snyam du dgongs pa'o
T03D3817:243b-10: myur ba la sogs pa'i rtags can du yang rigs pa ma yin te /
T03D3817:243b-11: blo bul ba la sogs pa de dag de'i rgyu
T03D3817:243b-12: las byung du rim gyis 'byung ba dang 'gal ba'i
T03D3817:243b-13: phyir ro // de ni sngar bstan pa nyid do //
T03D3817:243b-14: gnod pa can gyi tshad ma ni bdag sun dbyung
T03D3817:243b-15: ba'i skabs su sngar bstan pas mang du mi dgos
T03D3817:243b-16: so // de la rang dga' bas bskyed pa'i brda'i
T03D3817:243b-17: dbang gis srog chags la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi
T03D3817:243b-18: bye brag rnam pa de lta bu la dus zhes
T03D3817:243b-19: tha snyad btags kyi sgra dang don du 'brel pa
T03D3817:243b-20: brtags pa'i dbang gis ni ma yin no zhes bstan
T03D3817:243b-21: pa'i phyir tshe zhes bya ba'i sgras bye brag tu
T03D3817:243b-22: so // byas so // gang yang rung ba zhig
T03D3817:243b-23: smos na ni ji skad bstan pa'i 'dod pa bstan
T03D3817:243b-24: par mi 'gyur bas tshig gsum char smos so //
T03D3817:243b-26: brda'i sgrar sgro btags nas gzhi mthun par byas so //
T03D3817:243b-27: 'dir ni bsam gtan gyi ro myang ba dang dbral ba'i phyir 'di brjod la /
T03D3817:243b-28: snga ma la ni sbyin par bya ba dang /
T03D3817:243b-29: dus kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu ma bstan pa'i phyir zlos par mi 'gyur ro //
T03D3817:243b-30: de nyid gzhi de las bsod nams ches mang du
T03D3817:243b-31: grang med dpag tu med pa bskyed ces bya ba
T03D3817:243b-32: 'dis ni rgya che ba yongs su ston to //
T03D3817:243b-33: grangs dang rdzas dang dus kyi bye brag khyad par
T03D3817:243b-34: du 'phags pa'i sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams
T03D3817:243b-35: zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:243b-36: 'di ltar gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed ces bya ba ni grangs kyi bye brag bstan pa'o //
T03D3817:243b-37: lus zhes bya ba ni gting dpag dka' ba ste rdzas kyi bye brag go //
T03D3817:243b-38: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag ces bya ba ni dus kyi bye brag go //
T03D3817:243b-39: bskal pa bye ba de yang khrag khrig go //
T03D3817:243b-40: de yang 'bum zhes tshig sbyar ro //
T03D3817:243b-41: de ji ltar shes par bya snyam pa la /
T03D3817:243b-42: chos la bstod pa'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir yang
T03D3817:243b-43: rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so
T03D3817:244a-1: bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba shin tu zab
T03D3817:244a-2: pa chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3817:244a-3: / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so so rang
T03D3817:244a-4: gis rig par bya ba nyan thos la sogs pa
T03D3817:244a-5: gzhan dag gis bsam par mi nus pa 'dir bstan
T03D3817:244a-6: / pa'i phyir ro // mtshungs pa med ces bya
T03D3817:244a-7: ba ni gzhan du ni rnam pa 'di lta bu
T03D3817:244a-8: / pa'i phyir ro // ma bstan pas / 'di dang mtshungs pa'am /
T03D3817:244a-9: khyad par du 'phags pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:244a-10: 'dis ni mnyam pa dang lhag pa med pa'i phyir /
T03D3817:244a-11: rgyu bsam gyis mi khyab pa las 'bras bu bsam
T03D3817:244a-12: gyis mi khyab pa nyid 'byung ngo zhes de skad
T03D3817:244a-13: ston to // ji ltar mtshungs pa med snyam pa
T03D3817:244a-14: la theg pa phul du phyin [?] pa la yang
T03D3817:244a-15: dag par zhugs pa zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T03D3817:244a-16: shin tu pha rol tu phyin pa ni phul du phyin pa zhes bya ste /
T03D3817:244a-17: nyan thos la sogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3817:244a-18: theg pa mchog ces bya ba ni mchog rnams kyi theg pa yin nam /
T03D3817:244a-19: de theg pa yang yin la mchog kyang yin no zhes tshig rnam par sbyar te /
T03D3817:244a-20: gang dag der yang dag par zhugs pa de dag la de skad ces bya ba'o //
T03D3817:244a-21: de bzhin du theg pa phul du phyin pa la
T03D3817:244a-22: yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya ba yang mthun
T03D3817:244a-23: te / de gnyis ni rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o//
T03D3817:244a-24: rnam grangs bstan pa'i dgongs pa ni gdul ba'i skye bo la phan gdags pa ste /
T03D3817:244a-25: la la gang gis 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:244a-26: gzhan dag na re 'di las gzhan pa'i theg pa la ltos nas mchog go //
T03D3817:244a-27: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pas phul du phyin pa'o zhe'o //
T03D3817:244a-28: yang na mchog ni dam pa'o //
T03D3817:244a-29: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang nyan thos
T03D3817:244a-30: kyi theg pa la ltos nas dam pa yod snyam
T03D3817:244a-31: pa la theg pa phul du phyin pa la yang
T03D3817:244a-32: dag par zhugs pa zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T03D3817:244a-33: shin tu rab tu phyin pa ni phul du phyin pa zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3817:244a-34: nyan thos la sogs pa'i theg pa mang po dag
T03D3817:244a-35: gi nang na 'di shin tu rab tu phyin pas
T03D3817:244a-36: 'dir phul du phyin pa zhes bya ba'i sgra smos
T03D3817:244a-37: te / de ni theg pa chen po nyid do //
T03D3817:244a-38: nyan thos la sogs pa rnams ni chos bstan pa
T03D3817:244a-39: 'di lta bu'i snod ma yin pa de'i phyir byang
T03D3817:244a-40: chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ched du gsungs so //
T03D3817:244b-0: des na chos kyi rnam grangs @244b 'di la mtshungs pa med ces bsgrubs pa yin no //
T03D3817:244b-1: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:244b-2: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3817:244b-3: pas ni ji skad bshad pa'i don rnams rab tu
T03D3817:244b-4: bsgrubs nas mjug bsdu bar byed cing de sgrub par
T03D3817:244b-5: byed pa la bstod pa'i khyad par ston to //
T03D3817:244b-6: gang gi phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsam gyis mi khyab cing gzhal du med pa de'i phyir /
T03D3817:244b-7: de'i rnam par smin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
T03D3817:244b-8: des na gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa
T03D3817:244b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa grub pa yin no
T03D3817:244b-10: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3817:244b-11: dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
T03D3817:244b-13: de la bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba ni bsam pa'i yul las 'das pa'i phyir /
T03D3817:244b-14: rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir ston to //
T03D3817:244b-15: mtshungs pa med ces bya ba ni zla med pa'o //
T03D3817:244b-16: gzhal du med ces bya ba ni sems can thams
T03D3817:244b-17: cad bsgos kyang gzhal du mi nus pa'i phyir ro
T03D3817:244b-18: // tshad med ces bya ba ni yul chen po
T03D3817:244b-19: la sogs pas kyang tshad du mi rung bas nam
T03D3817:244b-20: mkha' bas kyang lhag pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3817:244b-21: yang na 'di dang thams cad ni rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o //
T03D3817:244b-22: sems can de dag thams cad nga'i byang chub phrag
T03D3817:244b-23: par thogs pa 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni byang
T03D3817:244b-24: chub kyi khur khyer bas phrag la khyar ba dang
T03D3817:244b-25: 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3817:244b-26: 'di mtha' dag gis ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i ro myang ba yongs su btang ste /
T03D3817:244b-27: ye shes kyi tshogs bskang ba'i rgyu chos yongs su
T03D3817:244b-28: gzung ba la sogs pa nyid la 'dun pa dang
T03D3817:244b-29: smon lam gyis gnas par bya'o zhes bstan pa yin
T03D3817:244b-30: no // ci'i phyir theg pa mchog la yang dag
T03D3817:244b-31: par zhugs pa rnams kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis
T03D3817:244b-32: gsungs kyi gzhan dag la ni ma yin no //
T03D3817:244b-33: ci bcom ldan 'das la yang zhe sdang dang 'dod
T03D3817:244b-34: pa mnga' 'am snyam du sems shing de ci'i slad
T03D3817:244b-36: lan du rab 'byor dman pa la mos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3817:244b-37: 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la
T03D3817:244b-38: bu gcig pa bzhin du byams pa'i phyir zhe sdang
T03D3817:244b-39: dang 'dod pa mi mnga' mod kyi 'on kyang gang
T03D3817:244b-40: dag gi tshe snod du gyur pa de dag la
T03D3817:244b-41: de'i tshe ston te gzhan du ni ma yin no
T03D3817:245a-0: // @245a * // de ltar ma yin na thams cad mkhyen pas bcom
T03D3817:245a-1: ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa nyid
T03D3817:245a-2: du 'gyur ro zhes de skad ston to //
T03D3817:245a-3: dman pa la sogs pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba
T03D3817:245a-4: ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis so
T03D3817:245a-5: // bdag la sogs par lta ba rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni phyi rol pa rnams kyis so //
T03D3817:245a-6: de ni gnas med ces bya ba ni de go skabs med ces bya ba'o //
T03D3817:245a-7: gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang
T03D3817:245a-8: mnyan par mi nus pa de so so'i skye bo
T03D3817:245a-9: rnams kyis nus par ji ltar 'gyur /
T03D3817:245a-10: gang de dag gis mnyan par mi nus pa de
T03D3817:245a-11: blang ba dang kun chub par bya bar ji ltar
T03D3817:245a-12: nus te mi srid do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T03D3817:245a-13: go // 'dis ni rnal 'byor du snyoms par 'jug pa la 'dzud do //
T03D3817:245a-14: gal te de ltar na 'phags pa rab 'byor gyis
T03D3817:245a-15: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar mnyan par nus
T03D3817:245a-16: she na / bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis te nyes pa med do //
T03D3817:245a-17: sa thams cad las gang du mdo 'di bshad pa'i
T03D3817:245a-18: sa phyogs gcig pu bsngags par 'gyur ro zhes bstan
T03D3817:245a-19: par lha la sogs pa rim gro byed pa'i khyad
T03D3817:245a-20: par bstan pa'i phyir yang rab 'byor zhes bya ba
T03D3817:245a-22: sngar ni phyi'i bstan bcos la rjes su chags pa dang dbral ba'i phyir gsungs la /
T03D3817:245a-23: da ni bsam gtan gyi ro myang ba dang dbral
T03D3817:245a-24: ba'i phyir gsungs pas tshig zlos par mi 'gyur te
T03D3817:245a-25: / thams cad bsdus pa'i don brjod pa kho nas
T03D3817:245a-26: skabs tha dad par brjod pa'i phyir zlos par mi
T03D3817:245a-28: mchod par 'os par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gdugs dang /
T03D3817:245a-29: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pas so //
T03D3817:245a-30: phyag bya bar 'os pa ni 'dud par bya ba'o //
T03D3817:245a-31: bskor ba bya bar 'os pa ni bskor bar bya ba'o //
T03D3817:245a-32: de'i phyir mchod par 'os pa la sogs pa'i chos dang ldan pas mchod rten no //
T03D3817:245a-33: gal te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dra ba 'di
T03D3817:245a-34: la rab tu brtson pa dag las kyang la la
T03D3817:245a-35: mnar bar 'gyur bar ji ltar snang snyam du sems
T03D3817:245a-36: pa la sdig pa yongs su 'byang ba'i khyad par
T03D3817:245a-37: brten pa'i phyir rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
T03D3817:245a-38: kyi bu mo gang dag ces bya ba la sogs
T03D3817:245a-39: pa gsungs so // mnar bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni spyo ba dang /
T03D3817:245a-40: mtshang 'bru ba la sogs pas gnod par byed pa'o //
T03D3817:245b-0: @245b yongs su mnar bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni
T03D3817:245b-1: gsad pa dang bcing ba la sogs pas gnod par
T03D3817:245b-2: byed pa'o // bdag nyid chen po de lta bu
T03D3817:245b-3: dag la ji ltar mnar bar 'gyur snyam du sems
T03D3817:245b-4: pa la de ci'i slad du zhes zhus pa dang
T03D3817:245b-5: byed pa'o // / lan du 'di ltar sems can
T03D3817:245b-6: de dag gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T03D3817:245b-7: byed pa'o // / so // tshe rabs snga ma'i
T03D3817:245b-8: zhes bya ba ni tshe rabs snga ma la byas
T03D3817:245b-9: byed pa'o // / so // pa dag go //
T03D3817:245b-10: tshe 'di nyid la zhes bya ba ni da ltar
T03D3817:245b-12: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang thob par 'gyur ro
T03D3817:245b-13: zhes bya ba ni sdig pa yongs su byang nas
T03D3817:245b-14: dus gzhan na bsgom pa la brtson pa dag myur
T03D3817:245b-15: du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T03D3817:245b-16: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
T03D3817:245b-17: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3817:245b-18: de nyid gzhi de las bsod nams ches mang du
T03D3817:245b-19: grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed do zhes gang
T03D3817:245b-21: rnam pa gang gis grangs med dpag tu med par
T03D3817:245b-22: khong du chud par bya snyam mam rab 'byor ngas
T03D3817:245b-23: mngon par shes te zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T03D3817:245b-25: mang bas grangs med dpag tu med par bstan te /
T03D3817:245b-26: de la rab 'byor mngon par shes te 'das pa'i
T03D3817:245b-27: dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med
T03D3817:245b-28: pa na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mthu
T03D3817:245b-30: 'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po de'i mthu ste /
T03D3817:245b-31: bsod nams kyi phung po ches khyad par du 'phags
T03D3817:245b-32: pa mchog tu gyur pa 'di snyed kyang zil gyis
T03D3817:245b-34: mar me mdzad nas bzung ste bskal ba grangs med pa'i par du ste /
T03D3817:245b-35: bskal bgrangs med pa ni grangs zad pa'i phyir ro //
